name: fixanimationcontroller
description: Using Babylon.js, please create a system similar to Unity's Animator Controller using Blend Trees the `AnimationState.ts` script is an existing implementation I previously created to Mimic Unity's Animation Controller functionallity for Babylon.js. It uses the `babylon.toolkit.d.ts` runtime library that provides Unity-Like functionallity for babylon.js. It works, but it is CPU intensive and stutters a bit when using blend trees but I think lerping the weights should smooth that out.
